homeAbout: Developer passionated about the idea of creating useful applications for the persons.
aboutParagraphs: I'm a Software Developer passionate about the idea of ​​being able to convert ideas into technological solutions that positively impact the lives of others. By constantly learning and searching for new challenges that allow me to continue growing as a professional.

I have a great notion of responsibility and teamwork, always focused on meeting the objectives I set for myself, where I make use of my ability to analyze and solve problems, which allows me to approach projects with a comprehensive and efficient vision.
projectsP: Check out the projects I have done and with which technologies they were created.

projectsList.name: BeSporty
projectsList.description: Web application for a sports equipment e-commerce.
